concept.title: Use Katalon plugins for Jenkins integration on Ubuntu

li.p: Katalon TestOps CI is an easier way to execute Katalon Studio tests remotely or schedule remote Katalon Studio execution. Learn more

conbody.p: This tutorial walks you through basic steps to run Katalon Studio tests using Katalon plugin for Jenkins on a headless Ubuntu machine i.e. a machine without any display. You can find the plugin on Jenkins here: Katalon.
If you are interested in using Docker images instead, you can refer to our sample project on GitHub: ci-samples.
